reviewText:
If you are a FOCP fan you have to watch this! do not download the digital copy, your better off with the actual dvd, the sound and picture is so much better!

So far this is the only live show availbe online that I've found, the only downside to this show in particular is Pat T. isn't singing, he lost his voice a couple days before the show.

But for fans, this is a must own! thier music is getting harder and harder to find each day so get a copy while you can.
